decision.reasoning: Expert consensus is strongly pro-Seahawks: 48/58 experts (82.8%) pick Seahawks over 10 for Patriots, per multiple sources (ESPN, FOX). This creates a clear sentiment gap vs. current market at 55.5% YES. Public betting trends reinforce: 63% bets/69% handle on Seahawks (laying points), and fan polls favor Seahawks (ESPN). Moneyline shows some split (59% money on Pats), but overall wisdom of crowds (experts + public money/handle) points to Seahawks momentum forming. Social buzz lukewarm on rematch but not anti-Seahawks. As sentiment-focused conservative, this consensus supports gentle YES buy for value/momentum without chasing. No position yet, small bet preserves capital.
